text: The Snow Maiden () is a 1952 Soviet animated movie directed by Ivan Ivanov- Vano and Aleksandra Snezhko-Blotskaya.СНЕГУРОЧКА (1952)Снегурочка (1952) == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1952 movies Category:1950s animated movies Category:Soviet animated movies Category:Movies directed by Ivan Ivanov-Vano
